meanings.definition: The state or quality of being hazy.
meanings.sent1: The hazinesses in the morning fog made it hard to see.
meanings.sent2: The hazinesses of her memory made it difficult to recall the details.
meanings.sent3: The hazinesses of the situation cleared up once she put on her glasses.
meanings.sent4: The hazinesses of the past enveloped her mind like a thick cloud.
meanings.sent5: The hazinesses of the dream lingered long after she woke up.

meanings.sent1: The hazinesses in his explanation left us confused.
meanings.sent2: The hazinesses of the photograph made it hard to identify the subject.
meanings.sent3: The hazinesses in her speech made it sound like she was underwater.
meanings.sent4: The hazinesses of the painting gave it an abstract feel.
meanings.sent5: The hazinesses of the instructions led to many mistakes.
